name: Daily Exploration
info: Venture into unexplored territories and discover new locations for the Explorers' Guild. Map unknown areas and report your findings to expand our knowledge of the world.
dialogs: There are still many unmapped areas in our region.
Your discoveries help keep our maps up to date.
Your exploration skills are quite impressive.
Excellent work! These maps will be invaluable.
Thanks to explorers like you, our world grows less mysterious each day.
accept: I'm ready to explore the unknown!
